practice_id.description: Practice UUID - use the practice_id variable exactly as provided

weeks_from_now.description: Number of weeks from now (e.g., 3 for 'in 3 weeks')

specific_week_of_month.description: Specific week of target month (1-4, e.g., 3 for 'week 3')

target_month_offset.description: Month offset (0=this month, 1=next month, 2=month after next)

date_range_start.description: Start date for custom range (ISO format or natural language)

date_range_end.description: End date for custom range (ISO format or natural language)
